description: I've always used ClamTk with great success. I love it!

Can't understand why there are so many negative reviews here. Never had any problems with this installing on countless systems. This is a classic program that's been rock solid for many years. Install it and set it to update/run automatically. No worries.
Installed on my system and tried to run it but it failed to open. I don't know if it is the software or my laptop which is a ASUS X58L, hopefully others will find it works for them.
Finally a GUI that is working to ClamAV
There is no possibility to do auto updates.
tried this on 3 linux systems does not work on any of them, used to be very reliable this did, not anymore!!

Some of the reviews here say it's not working. It works fine. What I suspect happens is that the updated virus signatures take a little while to download, and there is really no user feedback that this is happening - which could appear that the app isn't working. My advice - perform an update within the ClamTK app and go ave a cup of coffee 

I chose the Flatpak version because I want updated AV software on a long-term support release (KDE Neon) without needing to add a PPA. Hope this helps.

the whole thing is a disaster. gave me 2000+ false positives, then offers no way to see them and/or take action to delete them. The documentation on the website is even more tragic. Just download the Malwarebytes extension for your Firefox browser and forget about this

Antivirus for my ubuntu 19.04. I installed it and at first it is have 0 antivirus signature . When I click check for update the program is hang and I close this . The I tried again to update the antivirus and take a quite long time the the antivirus signature is updated.
Doesn't work. Tried also downloading from flatpak, with no success.
It runs for gnome manjaro, although the applicaiton isn't built very well and feel unstable.
Worked initially but now failing to update
summary: Worked initially but now failing to update

description: Detected real threats, however a little buggy
mala app no sirve y no ayuda
summary: no esta en español y solo analiza documentos
